title: Podium not provided with ramp but provided with car lifts may be allowed subject to minimum two numbers, for vehicles up to 200 parking and one additional car lift for every 100 parking beyond 200 parking or part thereof
clause_text: Podium not provided with ramp but provided with car lifts may be allowed subject to minimum two numbers, for vehicles up to 200 parking and one additional car lift for every 100 parking beyond 200 parking or part thereof.
